Package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.action

package me.itzloghotxd.pdk.action
Provides a class and an interface for managing actions within the plugin.

This package includes:

  • Action - Defines an executable action with a unique identifier.
  • ActionManager - Manages the registration and execution of actions.

Actions are identified by a string and can be executed with optional parameters for a given player. The ActionManager allows plugins to register and trigger these actions dynamically.

Author: ItzLoghotXD
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Action
    Represents an action that can be executed within the plugin.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ActionManager
    Manages the registration and execution of actions within the plugin.
